verses.name: Genesis 39:6
verses.text: And he left all that he had in Joseph’s hand; and he knew not ought he had, save the bread which he did eat. And Joseph was a goodly person, and well favoured.

verses.name: Genesis 39:7
verses.text: And it came to pass after these things, that his master’s wife cast her eyes upon Joseph; and she said, Lie with me.

verses.name: Genesis 39:8
verses.text: But he refused, and said unto his master’s wife, Behold, my master wotteth not what is with me in the house, and he hath committed all that he hath to my hand;
